question: 火災
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>fire</kanji> <kanji>disaster</kanji> is a <vocabulary>fire disaster</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>conflagration</vocabulary>. Maybe you'll get to meet a sexy firefighter if things go well...
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
